VectorDef.hd : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n) -> ?A where ?A : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?n : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (a : ?A), VectorDef.cons ?A a (?n + ?m) (VectorDef.append v w) = VectorDef.append (VectorDef.cons ?A a ?n v) w where ?A : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?n : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- nat] ?m : [A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- nat]

permutation_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, {permutation l1 l2} + {~ permutation l1 l2}

in_or_app : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a l \/ In a m -> In a (l ++ m)
in_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {In a l} + {~ In a l}
split_one_in_ex : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 : list A), In a l1 -> exists l2 : list A, In (a, l2) (split_one l1)
nodup_inv : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (k l : list A) (a : A), nodup decA k = a :: l -> ~ In a l
add_frequency_list_1 : forall (a : A) (l : list (A * nat)), (forall ca : nat, ~ In (a, ca) l) -> In (a, 1) (add_frequency_list a l)
add_frequency_list = fix add_frequency_list (a : A) (l : list (A * nat)) {struct l} : list (A * nat) := match l with | nil => (a, 1) :: nil | (b, n) :: l1 => if eqA_dec a b then (a, S n) :: l1 else (b, n) :: add_frequency_list a l1 end : A -> list (A * nat) -> list (A * nat) Arguments add_frequency_list _ _%list_scope
in_cons : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b l -> In b (a :: l)
find_min_correct : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A), match find_min f l with | Some (a, b) => (In b l /\ a = f b) /\ (forall c : A, In c l -> f b <= f c) | None => l = nil end
find_max_correct : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A), match find_max f l with | Some (a, b) => (In b l /\ a = f b) /\ (forall c : A, In c l -> f c <= f b) | None => l = nil end
ulist_cons : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), ~ In a l -> ulist l -> ulist (a :: l)
VectorDef.t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
in_map_fst_inv : forall (B C : Type) (a : B) (l : list (B * C)), In a (map fst l) -> exists c : C, In (a, c) l
BinPos.Pos.max_case_strong : forall (n m : BinNums.positive) (P : BinNums.positive -> Type), (BinPos.Pos.le m n -> P n) -> (BinPos.Pos.le n m -> P m) -> P (BinPos.Pos.max n m)
split_one_permutation : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), In (a, l1) (split_one l2) -> permutation (a :: l1) l2
in_nil : forall (A : Type) (a : A), ~ In a nil
Contradict1 : forall a b : Prop, b -> (a -> ~ b) -> ~ a

```intros a n m H. induction m as [| h t IH].
- simpl. intros _. contradiction.
- simpl. intros [Ha | Hin].
  + destruct Ha as [Ha1 Ha2]. left. assumption.
  + apply IH in Hin. right. assumption.```
